Package org.twelve.usecases.system

Class ThresholdRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.twelve.usecases.system.ThresholdRepository
  • public class ThresholdRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to store threshold values of the program.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ThresholdRepository​(ThresholdsGateway thresholdsGateway)
      Set and get thresholds in the system.

      • createThresholds

        public void createThresholds​(int lendMoreThanBorrow,
                             int maxIncompleteTrade,
                             int maxWeeklyTrade,
                             int numberOfDays,
                             int numberOfEdits,
                             int numberOfStats,
                             int requiredTradesForTrusted)
        Create the thresholds for this program.
        Parameters:
        lendMoreThanBorrow - Number of items a user has to lend more than borrow to be able to make a trade
        maxIncompleteTrade - Maximum number of incomplete trades before a user's account is frozen
        maxWeeklyTrade - Maximum number of trades a user can have in one week
        numberOfDays - Number of days for when a reverse trade is set up after a temporary trade
        numberOfEdits - Number of edits an account can do with a Trade
        numberOfStats - Number of trading statistics an account should see
        requiredTradesForTrusted - The number of trades required to make an account trusted.
